extends JSONNode.Builder

      • add

        JSONArray.Builder add(Object value)
                      throws IllegalArgumentException
        Add a value to an array. The value must be an instance of Boolean , CharSequence, JSONNode, Number, or the null value.
        Parameters:
        value - A legal JSON data-type value
        Returns:
        self
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the value is not one of the legal JSON data types.
